briefdescription.para: It's the main process of the battleship, it generates the whole table and ships.
Destroys the used shared memory and semaphores.

parameterdescription.para: The id of the shared memory segment.

briefdescription.para: It attaches itself to the already created memory.

parameterdescription.para: The adress where to store the shared memory segment pointer.

briefdescription.para: It counts the amount of bombs that the player has left.

parameterdescription.para: The adress of the game status.

briefdescription.para: It puts the bomb on a specific position of the table.
It obtains the the row and the column of the table from STDIN.

memberdef.argsstring: (int sx, int sy, int z, int who, S_TABLE **tableS)
memberdef.name: draw_hz

memberdef.argsstring: (int sx, int sy, int z, int who, S_TABLE **tableS)
memberdef.name: draw_vt

briefdescription.para: It prints each row of the table.
It prints the table of the battlehsip.

parameterdescription.para: The address of the game status.

briefdescription.para: It decides if it has to lock the table or wait for the opponent. Peform semaphore wait/notifies: ARGUMENTS: semx 0 : table lock semaphore 1 : opponent notify semaphore block 0 : perform notify 1 : perform wait.

parameterdescription.para: It is the parameter to decide what have to do with semaphore
It decides what have to do with the table

simplesect.para: Luciano Zemin, Nicolás Magni, Nicolás Purita
